title: Moment student is knocked unconscious after being sucker punched by classmate who takes MMA lessons
text:
A high school student in Mexico was knocked unconscious after being sucker punched during a fight with a classmate - an incident captured on a cellphone.

The frightening incident took place Wednesday near Professor Augusto Hernández Olivé Prefeco School in Paraíso, a municipality in the southeastern state of Tabasco.

The victim, who was not identified by the school or local media, got shoved by a student it appears he was about to fight.

Another classmate, later identified as Sebastián who is a student of Muay Thai, then stepped up and delivered a right-handed punch to the side of his face.

A student (left) squares up with a classmate (center) at a high school in southern Mexico before a third boy (right) identified as Sebastián stepped in and delivered a sucker punch

The boy was knocked unconscious during a fight in Mexico on Wednesday. The school dismissed reports indicating the victim had died after suffering a stroke later that night

Sebastián (right) lands a right-handed punch that sent his classmate to the ground near a high school in Mexico

The student instantly fell to the ground and was lying on his back before school administrators came to his aid.

A male student is heard in the background uttering, 'stop messing around, Sebas.'

The school quickly moved to dismiss rumors that the student had died at a local hospital after suffering a stroke.

'In regards to the young men, it is clear that they are in good health and the school regulations were applied due to the fact they were in uniform during this painful situation. We also point out that the actions occurred outside the campus facilities,' the statement read.

'Our school will continue to work hard to strengthen values and eliminate these painful actions in young people from Tabasco, but we cannot do it alone, we need the support of parents, neighbors, government and the community in general.'
description: A high school student in Mexico was knocked unconcious after being sucker punched during a fight with a classmate - an incident captured on a cellphone.
